title: The Writer's Almanac for Tuesday, December 14, 2021
description: It was on this day in 1911 that the Norwegian explorer Roald Amundsen and his team became the first people ever to reach the South Pole.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1911 that the Norwegian explorer Roald Amundsen and his team became the first people ever to reach the South Pole.
